^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClearPending.description: This action is used to clear all the pending values.
ClearPending.longDescription: This action shall perform a clear pending values.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellManager.description: This is the schema definition for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF Manager Schema.
DellManager.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an OEM Manager for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellAttributes.description: An array of references to the DellAttributes.
DellAttributes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a .

Jobs.description: A reference to the collection of Job associated with this system.
Jobs.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of type Job.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetToDefaults.description: This action is used to reset the Dell attributes to default.
ResetToDefaults.longDescription: This action shall perform reset of the Dell attributes to their default values.

ResetType.description: The type of ResetType option to be performed.
ResetType.longDescription: The type of ResetType option to be performed.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.All: All configuration is set to default.
enumDescriptions.Default: All configuration is set to default except users and network settings are preserved.
enumDescriptions.ResetAllWithRootDefaults: All configuration including network is set to default exception root user password set to calvin.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DisplayValue.description: This is the Display Value of the Configuration opertaion.
DisplayValue.longDescription: This property shall contain Display Value of the Configuration opertaion.

ErrCode.description: This is the Error code of the configuration operation.
ErrCode.longDescription: This property shall contain Error code of the configuration operation, default value for success is 0.

Name.description: This is the Name of the configuration operation.
Name.longDescription: This property shall contain Name of the configuration operation.

NewValue.description: This is the New Value of the configuration operation.
NewValue.longDescription: This property shall contain New Value of the configuration operation.

OldValue.description: This is the Old Value of the configuration operation.
OldValue.longDescription: This property shall contain Old Value of the configuration operation.
